name: nikupiku
description: This is a clone of the town in the game PikuNiku made for our Intermediate Game Development final project. We had six weeks to attempt to replicate PikuNiku, which was made by Arnaud De Bock, Rémi Forcadell, and Alan Zucconi and published by Devolver Studios. It includes the town scene and six different building scenes that the player can move in and out of. There are npcs all over the town that you can talk and interact with as well. Cloning the game included recreating the unique movement for the player character, Piku, making the NPC dialogue and movement system, replicating the visuals, and more.
